revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Pantographia; containing accurate copies of all the known alphabets in the world; together with an English explanation of the peculiar force or power of each lette..."
revision.text: Possibly: Pantographia; containing accurate copies of all the known alphabets in the world; together with an English explanation of the peculiar force or power of each letter: to which are added, specimins of all well-authenticated oral languages; forming a comprehensive digest of phonology. By Edmund Fry, Letter-Founder, Type-Street. (London : Printed by Cooper and Wilson, For John and Arthur Arch, Gracechurch-Street; John White, Fleet-Street; John Edwards, Pall-Mall; and John Debrett, Piccadilly, MDCCXCIX. [1799]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2449198~S1
